wikimediacampaignevents-desc: Provides Wikimedia-specific features for the CampaignEvents extension.
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-h: If this program or event is supported by a grant from the Wikimedia Foundation, please provide your Grant ID, which you can find in the [https://wmf.fluxx.io/ Grantee Portal (Fluxx)]. Please enter the numbers and dashes in your grant ID, but exclude the letters. For example, if your grant ID is G-1111-1111, please enter 1111-1111.
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-invalid: The Grant ID you entered seems to be incorrect. Please double-check your Grant ID in the [https://wmf.fluxx.io/ Grantee Portal (Fluxx)] and re-enter.
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-api-fai: There was an issue with validating your Grant ID. You can try submitting the form again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, you can still submit the form without a Grant ID and add it later by editing the event details.
wikimediacampaignevents-communitylist-no: There are no WikiProjects on this wiki.
wikimediacampaignevents-communitylist-he: Discover WikiProjects - groups of contributors focused on specific topics, areas of Wikipedia, or tasks.
